name: Match'em All !
description:
Tap quickly all pairs.

The faster you reach for the couples, the more points you earn, otherwise you'll lose points if you spend too many seconds and the icons will be mixed with animation.

Unlock the various levels, keep the score over the finish line to the end to unlock the next level.

- 6 levels to unlock and discover

- Extreme Mode

- Charts for both normal and extreme iPad iPhone / iPod touch (Game Center)
